isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - SPRING BRAKE CONTROL VALVE (MIDLAND ROSS) - CLEAN AND INSPECT

svcproc.title: CLEAN AND INSPECT
svcproc.para: Wash all metal parts in cleaning solvent. Use compressed air to dry parts. Inspect body and end cap seats. Face of seats must be flat and smooth with no cracks or nicks. If any of these conditions exists, replace valve.
